    | text      = Anyway, I don't care to mock the dead, but I do think that there's something still very

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
